directions: Put tea in teapot and pour in 1 cup boiling water, then swirl gently to warm pot and rinse tea. Strain out and discard water, reserving tea leaves in pot.
Add remaining 4 cups boiling water to tea and let steep 2 minutes. Stir in sugar (to taste) and mint sprigs and steep 3 to 4 minutes more. Serve in small heatproof glasses.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon loose Chinese gunpowder green tea
3 to 4 tablespoons sugar, or to taste
title: Moroccan Mint Tea
